Html:
Hi, is it possible to create a linechart with a fill color, and a opacity? 

If this is not supported out of the box, will the architecture all this to be implimented?

Thanks

Craig.

Hi Craig,

if you mean area chart, when some area below or between some line charts is filled with color, than currently we do not provide such chart out-of-box, though there are plans for its development.

By now you can archive such chart by drawing a lot of line charts vertically so that their stroke color make fill, but this solution is not efficient at all.

Best regards,

Mikhail Brinchuk.

But if you meant line chart with transparent stroke color, this is supported - simply create a transparent color, than a SolidColorBrush of it, and assign this brush to Stroke property of LineChart.

Mikhail.
